dataIdInfo.idPurp:
Contains one tool: SelectByRegex. This tool searches a layer's attribute table for records based on the pattern given in a regular expression string, in a particular field. Matching rows will be selected in the map.
This tool requires Python 3 and the Pandas package, and thus can only be used in ArcGIS Pro
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Contains one tool: SelectByRegex. This tool searches a layer's attribute table for records based on the pattern given in a regular expression string, in a particular field. Matching rows will be selected in the map.

This tool requires Python 3 and the Pandas package, and thus can only be used in ArcGIS Pro

searchKeys.keyword: Regular Expression Regex Query Select Selection
